thread.title: Bright Coats for Cold Days
thread.title_full: Bright Coats for Cold Days -- The Cut

author: The Cut
title: Bright Coats for Cold Days
text:
View Slideshow Photo: Bobby Doherty/New York Magazine
Though the days are getting shorter, there's still time to invest in a reliable coat to carry you through the darkest season of the year. This winter, it's worth getting creative with colors, textures, and shape: A coat that's not your average puffer can brighten up your look and help you avoid the snow-season doldrums. We asked 12 New York women to try on some of the best coats of the season, from bright furs to eye-popping prints to clean, modern constructions. Click through the slideshow to see all of our selections.
Photographs by Bobby Doherty. Styling by Rebecca Ramsey. Photo Editor: Emily Shornick. Market Editor: Lori Keong. Hair Stylist: Martin-Christopher Harper @ Platform|nyc. Makeup Artist: Allie Smith.
*Select images from this spread appear in the October 5, 2015 issue of New York Magazine.
